label: AB_mC8_15_a_e-003
title: CrS Structure
comments: (Wyckoff, 1963) lists two structures for CrS.  The first is this structure, where the sulfur (4e) site has 3\% vacancies.  The second is the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB_hP4_194_c_a-001}{NiAs ($B8_{1}$) structure}.  (Venkatraman, 1990) list this structure as the ground state and $B8_{1}$ has the high-temperature phase, with the transition occuring at 297K.
